alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 6:51PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Norfolk, northwestern Plymouth and north central Bristol Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 651 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brockton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Brockton, Weymouth, Braintree, Randolph, Stoughton, Bridgewater, Marshfield, Easton, Hingham, Scituate, Pembroke, Sharon, Rockland, Abington, Duxbury, Whitman, Hanover, East Bridgewater, Holbrook and Norwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth
